messages.content: Give me a short line that would be in character for Mario to say.
Give me a line of dialogue that would be in character for "Rita Mordio" from "Tales of Vesparia" to say.
"Ugh, you're such a pain! Fine, let's just blast them with magic and get this over with."
Finally, Give me a line of dialogue that would be in character for "Lady Ranni" from "Elden Ring" to say.
"Bearer of the Elden Ring, may your path be guided by the grace of the Golden Order, for the good of all the realms."
